text:
Hi,
I get the following exception whenever I run a stored proc on DB2 from jsp page.
This exception is thrown only on a particular condition in search criteria.

Exception: com.ibm.db2.jcc.b.DisconnectException: Execution failed due to a 
distribution protocol error that caused deallocation of the conversation.  The 
command requested could not be completed because of a permanent error condition 
detected at the target system.

Please let me know the reason for this exception.

Thanks,
Mohan
creator: mohan.pulicheri@iflexsolutions.com
drzewo@post.pl
text:
Be more detailed, we do not know what your application looks like (does it use a
data source? If so - how is it configured?  How do you obtain a connection to
db? And so on). 

Please consult your database documentation for the reason such an exception can
be thrown. BTW, full stack trace would be helpful. Providing a source code and
description of conditions the error occured is also welcome.

This issue seems that it has nothing to do with Tomcat, therefore marking it as
INVALID.
